channel.title: General Hiromi Travel Tokyo on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Hiromi Travel Tokyo on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: woah.. yesterday i was in japan. today i walked all around chicago.
item.description: So i got back this morning. i wasn’t able to sleep or anything so i went on the needed journey to get some project pieces and tools. I went to radio shack and home depot. all by walking. it was pretty awesome. i am now really tired. i imagine later tonight i will through up a play by play of my time in tokyo with hiromi. but for now i am going to throw up a play by play of me sleeping.
